TEXT.S:
Sandimen Sandimen a sakuwan ku Pingtung. kumud nu kalesakan, 185.9 km². kalesakan nu linpanti 94.02 km², kalesakan nu pawliwti 85.25 km², u kasabinawlan, 7,698 ku tademaw. u kasalumaluma' sa, 2,296 ku luma'. ilabu nu kasaniyazu' nu siyang sa, 7,320 ku ingcumin a tademaw. u kasabinawlan, Pakalatu 95%(Paiwan, Rukai) ku kasabinawlan. u Paiwan atu Rukai ku sakalaniyazu'.
nikasakuwakuwan Sandimen mala 10 a cuwen atu 12 ku niyazu'. kina 12 a niyazu'sa, Timur, Tjavatjavang, Valjulu, Paridrayan, Sagaran, Talamakau, Cavak, Djineljepan, Tjailjaking, Kingdalruwane, Tjukuvulj, Tjusepayuan. Sandimen:Timur196;7.7 SandimenPaiwan a binacadan a kamu, Timuri tini i Taywan nuwamisan nu Ping-tung-siang, nuwamisan nu Kaw-sing-se Maw-lin-cuy, Liw-kuay-cuy, nuwalian macapi i Wu-tay-siang, satip macapi u Kaw-su-siang, Yan-pu-siang, nutimulan macapi i Ne-pu-siang, Ma-ciy-siang. u ahebal ku lala' makala tu 196 ping-bang-kung-li, nipasiluttu ngangan i Ping-tung-siang u sakatulu nu tabakiay, uyni dada'Se-ce-siang, U'-tay-siang, u tademaw pakala' tu 7.7 malebut a tademaw, u kakatuuday nu Ping-tung-siang a tademaw nu binacadan a niyazu'. 100~2159 Sandimen:Timur196;7.7 SandimenPaiwan a binacadan a kamu, Timuri tini i Taywan nuwamisan nu Ping-tung-siang, nuwamisan nu Kaw-sing-se Maw-lin-cuy, Liw-kuay-cuy, nuwalian macapi i Wu-tay-siang, satip macapi u Kaw-su-siang, Yan-pu-siang, nutimulan macapi i Ne-pu-siang, Ma-ciy-siang. u ahebal ku lala' makala tu 196 ping-bang-kung-li, nipasiluttu ngangan i Ping-tung-siang u sakatulu nu tabakiay, uyni dada'Se-ce-siang, U'-tay-siang, u tademaw pakala' tu 7.7 malebut a tademaw, u kakatuuday nu Ping-tung-siang a tademaw nu binacadan a niyazu'. Sandimen mala 10 a cuwen atu 12 ku niyazu'. kina 12 a niyazu'sa, Timur, Tjavatjavang, Valjulu, Paridrayan, Sagaran, Talamakau, Cavak, Djineljepan, Tjailjaking, Kingdalruwane, Tjukuvulj, Tjusepayuan. 100~2159 uynian a buyu'a lala' atu enal u kalalikeluhana kakitizaan, kayadahay ku masaungcuyungcuyay a buyu',hay-pa i 100 katukuh i 2,159 depah, izaw ku Ay-liaw a sauwactalabi i niyazu', demiad tungusay u ze-day-ci-bung a demiad, aenengan a binawlan u Paiwan a binacadan u kahenulan,u zumaay a Paiwan a binacadan, mahiza u Sin-ye a niyazu', ayzaay a mihcaan pakala tu sakapahay aidangan a kakitizaan, patayza i Maw-lin a kanatalay a idangan.
LaylaySandimen"timur"Suann-tē-mn̂g1935TimurTalavatsalSalalau"" Sandimen, lalengawan/lalekalannamakayni i Paiwan a kamu,"timur" malinat tayni miatangku layakay nu tayniay a Hulan nu lalayay tunisasengiay a ngiha' kyu palu nu buyu'ay a kiwmah a banuhtu San-ti-men, nu ayaza i Taywan layakay a kamu masakamu tu San-ti-men "Suann-tē-mn̂g" 1935 a mihca i kaLipunan u Paywan a binacadan tu Timur, Talavatsal, Salalau tuluay nu kenis a tademaw malimat hay nikatukuh ayza nu Sandimen a kenis, nisasulitaan sakaysasangaan tu kalcalaecay nuzazan a kasaupuaan nu niyazu'ay, nanutawya nu Takaw a kenis atu Pingtungay a kenis nipikuwan, panganga han sa "". 1947""195019928 nazikuzan nu Kang-hu tu sayaway misumad tu Ta-kawan a kenis nu Sandimen a nikasu u ouwan malecabay a kenis, 1947 amihcaan masumat u Sandimen a kenis, 1950 a mihcaan masumat aca tu baluhayay nu Ping-tung a kenis, 1992 a mihcaan waluay a bulad hanika ayza kinangangan.
mikawaway tu kawaw nu kanatal a kakitazaan kenisi tiniay a kenis izaw ku cacay nataan a niyazu'(10) Cing-ye a niyazu',An-po a niyazu'Cing-san a niyazu'Ma-l-el a niyazu'Cow-se a niyazu'Say-ciya a niyazu'San-ti-men niyazu'Ta-se a niyazu'De-wen a niyazu'Ta-lay a niyazu'Cing-ye a niyazu'An-pu a niyazu'Cing-san a niyazu' a niyazu'Ma-el a niyazu'Kou-se a niyazu'Say-ciya a niyazu'San-ti a niyazu'Ta-se a niyazu'Sandimentini i nuwamisan Taywan Pin-tung a kuwan, u belaw saamisan nu akuwan Maw-lin a kenis, Liw-kuay a kenis, nuwalian u belaw u Uw-tay a kenis, satipan a belaw u Kaw-su a kenis, Yen-pu a kenis, mitules tu Ne-pu a kenis, Ma-ciya a kenis.
katinengan"""""""" Sandimenkasumamadan a ngangan u "Sin-se-di-mo-el", tungusay u Lukay a binacadan "San-ti-men" kenis a niyazu', Cung-ku a Cung-kou a u nu layakay akakitizaan nu malimatay nu layak miatangu layakay akamu misasengiay tu pipangangan "San-cu-maw-se" atu "Sandimen."
Shan-chuan cuyacuy a sangawShan-chuan cuyacuy a sangaw/Shanchuan Glass Suspension Bridge262452017303 Shan-chuan cuyacuy a sangaw tini i Taywan Maw-lin piazihan tu hekal nu kantal a kakitizaan, mitulesay tu Ping-tung akuwan San-ti-men a kenis atu Majia a kenistu caculilang nu tademaw cuyacuy a sangaw, miawas tu Kaw-ping sauwac adidi'ay cilis Ay-liaw a sauwac, u uzip nu sangaw u masacuyacuyay a sangaw, katanayu' a sangaw 262 kung-ce, laed tu sauwac palalecad tu talakaw sepat bataan izaw ku lima debah, nau satanayaay masacuyacuay a sangaw, katukuh 2017 a mihcaan u Tuing atuse Fu-sing a kakitizaan u baluhay a sacumud nu sauwac cuyavuy a sangaw "katanayu' nu sangaw 303 debah malakuit tuway". 100·32321,664 Shan-chuan cuyacuy a sangaw/Shanchuan Glass Suspension Bridgeu satakus tu Ping-tung akuwan San-ti-men a kenis San-ti a niyazu' atu Majia a kenisPa-ye a niyazu' tu cuyacuy a sangaw, tunusay masacuyacuyay a sangaw, u sakatuuday pitubian tu tademaw cacay lasubu, Liu-li-cu a sakahini tu pipazeng nu Paiwan a binacadan a Yi-su-ciya ci Sa-ku-liw-pa-wa-wa-lung mibihekacan a misanga', u uzip nu sangaw tusaay a takinilan izaw kunipazeng tu tulu bataan izaw ku tusa a paya' tu kungku, nusakamu 32 masazumaay a kungku nu niyazu', cuyacuy a sangaw i sacumut atu katukuhan patizeng tu Ma-say-ke yi-su-zuo-pin atu tabakiay a ba'tu kunipazeng tu yi-su. uzip tu sangaw tusa a takinilan pahezek tu pitanam katukuh tatengaay tu amiculul a demiadan micunus tu mipazeng tu 1,664 ku Liu-li-cu. 800 , ,"" .. , ,, , malumanay a Fa-wan a niyazu' na u Paiwanay tu ,Rukai a binacadan u lalangawan a tuas ulalekalan a lala' nu tuas, malumanay a Fa-wan u talakaw pakala tu 800 debah, ba'tuay aluma' micangday tu butu' amipatizeng atu nu ayawan a buyu' tu Se-lu, Kaw-yan atu kapahay aucya niyazu' silaed tu ai-liau nutimulan a sauwac, ilabu ku kakitizaan nu Paiwan a binacadan a kakawsan a buyu'"Ta-uw a buyu'", kasilutnu Paiwan a binacadan ba'tuay a luma' masupet u masakapahay malisimed u mahiniay nusuayaway tu butu' micapiay tu nanum, u satalakaway a maazih ku kakitizaan a lala' pawapen tu kasumamadanay tu Fa-wan a tademaw lihalay kunikauzip, uyza sa amitena' tu miubiay tu kapahay a ucya, i saayaway a mihcaan u Fa-wan niyazu' a tademaw katukuh tu cacay lasubu kayadah ku luma', u pikuwanay nu Lipun a ziday Lipun a tademaw napacici tu Se-lu atu Kaw-yan tusaay niyazu'an a tademaw, mabulaw tayza i Fa-wan, Taywan napatizang hawsa ku-min-cen-bu pasilut aca tu tuluay niyazu' a tademaw mabulaw ku niyazu' tayza i ayzaay Pa-yia, Majia atu Fa-wan a niyazu', nauyaananu Fa-wan a niyazu' pasumad han ku ngangan u malumanay Fa-wan.
